long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pinny - Pin & Save Web Locations ğŸ“

Overview:
Pinny is your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly marking and revisiting specific spots on web pages. Whether youâ€™re conducting research, studying, or simply browsing, Pinny allows you to save the exact locations on web pages that matter most to you. ğŸ“Œ

Key Features:
â€¢ Pin Locations: Easily pin specific spots on any webpage. Whether itâ€™s a paragraph, a line of text, or an image, Pinny lets you mark it with just a click. ğŸ”
â€¢ Easy Navigation: Return to your saved locations with a simple click. No more scrolling or searching through pages to find important information. âª
â€¢ Manage Pins: View, organize, and manage your pins through a user-friendly interface. Search through your pins by title, note, or URL. ğŸ“‚
â€¢ Add Notes: Optionally add notes to your pins for additional context or reminders about why a spot was important. âœï¸
â€¢ Quick Access Toolbar: Enable the floating toolbar to quickly add pins while you browse. ğŸ› ï¸
â€¢ Grouping and Sorting: Group your pins by webpage or sort them by timeâ€”either oldest or newest first, making it easier to find the information you need. ğŸ—‚ï¸
â€¢ Dark Mode: Enjoy browsing and pinning in both light and dark modes, enhancing visual comfort and accessibility. ğŸŒ—

Why Pinny?
Pinny is designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your online activities. Itâ€™s perfect for researchers, students, professionals, and anyone who needs to keep track of important web content. Say goodbye to lost information and tedious searchesâ€”Pinny keeps everything you need just a click away. ğŸ‘‹

Get Started:
Installing and using Pinny is straightforward:
1. Add Pinny to Chrome.
2. Navigate to any webpage.
3. Click the Pinny icon to open the floating toolbar and start pinning locations.
4. Access and manage all your pins anytime from the Pinny popup. ğŸ‰

Stay organized, stay efficient, and never lose track of important web locations again with Pinny!
